detail_desc: Sleeveless top in satin with lace details. Wrapover, lace-trimmed V-neck with a frill on the shoulders and a seam at the waist with a flounce to the hem. Unlined.

Shirt in sturdy cotton twill with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Flap chest pockets with a button, long sleeves with a sleeve placket and buttoned cuffs, and a straight-cut hem.

Fully lined sports bra in extra-sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric that shapes and sculpts the bust. Removable inserts, a racer back and a wide, double-layered hem with a scalloped edge. Extra firm support.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with short butterfly sleeves.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with a printed check pattern. Elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and raw-edge hems.
Zip-through hoodie in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Soft, non-wired bras in lace and jersey with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Paper straw hat with a pompom trim around the brim.
Poncho in soft, felted fabric with a two-way zip and wind flap at the front, a single fastener at each side, welt side pockets and a fringed hem. Unlined.
Double-layered triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
Long-sleeved, all-in-one pyjamas in soft, organic cotton jersey.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric doubled up with a pair of mesh shorts. Elasticated, drawstring waist and reflective details on one leg.
Short, sleeveless dress in soft cotton and modal jersey with a deep neckline and a narrow, elasticated seam at the waist.
Long-sleeved blouse in woven fabric with a small stand-up collar and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocked seam and a frill at the cuffs and hem.
Vest top in cotton jersey with a print motif.
Short-sleeved top in soft cotton and silk jersey with ribbing around the neckline.
Long-sleeved top in lightweight viscose jersey with a print motif on the front and a rounded hem.
Jumper in a soft knit with a motif, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved bolero in faux fur with a faceted button at the front. Satin lining.
T-shirt in cotton jersey.
Jersey T-shirt with a small opening and button at the back of the neck. Large, double-layered collar in a cotton weave that has a frill trim and is divided at the back.

5-pocket, high-waisted, ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch, flexible denim for maximum comfort. Relaxed fit with an adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), a zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Small lace trim, decorative gathers on the cups and ties at the back and back of the neck.
Shorts in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a text print on the front and sleeves, and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Shirt in washed denim with a collar, yoke front and back, pearly press-studs down the front and flap chest pockets with a press-stud. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Joggers in cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, patch front pockets and ribbed hems.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and straight-cut hems.
Treggings in stretch twill with a high, elasticated waist and slim legs.

Set with a dungaree dress and top in soft cotton. Dress in narrow-wale corduroy with adjustable straps, a gathered seam at the waist and elastication at the sides. Unlined. Long-sleeved top in patterned jersey.
Jacket in nylon with a slight sheen. Ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud and a zipped sleeve pocket. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Jersey lining.
Long-sleeved top in soft, organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket and a press-stud on one shoulder (sizes 1-4Y without a press-stud).
Short 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with a high waist and zip fly and button.

Push-up bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps that are lace-covered at the front, and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Top in jersey crêpe with butterfly sleeves, a round neckline and a small opening with a button at the front. Double-layered yoke with gathers at the shoulders and back.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Set with a top and pair of cycling shorts in soft, printed cotton jersey. Top with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y), short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a seam with a wide flounce at the hem. Cycling shorts with an elasticated waist.
Short, 5-pocket, high-waisted shorts in washed denim with worn details, a button fly and sewn-in, raw-edge turn-ups at the hems.

Sturdy leather shoulder bag with two handles, one with a detachable address tag and a detachable adjustable shoulder strap. Zip at the top, a zipped outer compartment and a zipped inner compartment. Lined. Size approx. 5x27x38 cm.
Long-sleeved top in sturdy jersey with a print motif on the front, round neckline, ribbing at the cuffs and short slits in the sides.
High-waisted shorts in a patterned viscose weave with a sheen. Pleats at the top, a concealed zip at the back, side pockets and short, wide legs.
Knee-length dress in airy chiffon with a V-neck, details on the shoulders and short cap sleeves. Buttons down the front, elastication at the back of the waist, and a sewn-on tie belt. Satin lining.

Dungarees in organic cotton with frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back and fasten at the front. Elastication at the back of the waist, concealed press-studs at the crotch and down the legs (not in sizes 1-4Y), and ribbed hems.
Fitted, cropped, sleeveless top in a rib knit with wide, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps and a sweetheart neckline with gathers at the front.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a low waist, cut-out sections at the sides and a high cut at the back.
Long-sleeved top in ribbed organic cotton jersey with a decorative scalloped trim around the neckline, press-stud on one shoulder and overlocked edges at the cuffs.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck.
A pair of earrings in metal decorated with plastic beads.
Chokers in various styles. Adjustable length, approx. 30-37.5 cm.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a grandad collar, buttons down the front and a fake jetted pocket at the top. Long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs.
Long-sleeved tops in soft sweatshirt fabric with print motifs. One top with a jersey-lined hood, both with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cotton jersey T-shirt with a print motif.
5-pocket, low-rise jeans in washed, stretch denim with hard-worn details, a button at the waist, zip fly and skinny legs.
Single-breasted, oversized jacket in woven fabric with wide notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and a single back vent. Concealed fastening at the front and cuffs. Lined.
Jersey playsuit with a smocked bodice, small frill trim at the top, narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a seam with a detachable tie belt at the waist. Short, slightly wider legs.
Dressing gown in soft fleece with a hood, front pockets and a tie belt at the waist.
Hat in a soft rib knit containing some wool.
Calf-length skirt in a softly draping weave with a high waist and concealed zip in one side. Unlined.
Trousers in a viscose and linen weave with wide smocking at the waist and straight, wide legs.
T-shirt in soft cotton jersey with a press-stud on one shoulder (except in sizes 1½-4Y).
Trenchcoat in a soft weave with a small stand-up collar, lapels and a double-layered yoke. Long, raglan sleeves, welt side pockets and a tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Hi-tops with lacing at the front, fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles.

Suit trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and slightly shorter legs. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Wide jumper in a soft, loose rib knit with dropped shoulders, sleeves that end just above the wrist with sewn-in turn-ups, and slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

Dress in patterned chiffon with decorative gathers at the neckline, an opening and button at the back of the neck and butterfly sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and a skirt that has an extra layer at the front and is longer at the back. Jersey lining.
Bikini top in sturdy, fast-drying functional fabric with lightly padded triangular cups that provide good support. Wide shoulder straps that cross at the back and a plastic fastener at the back.
Hat in a soft, fine knit with a turned-up hem that has an embroidered eye mask on both sides. The hem can also be folded down.

Short coat in a soft Italian wool blend containing some mohair. Concealed press-studs down the front, gently dropped shoulders and pockets in the side seams. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with decorative buttons on one shoulder and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Gathers in the side seams for best fit.
Sleeveless dress in soft cotton jersey with a flounce across the chest, seam at the waist and flared skirt.
5-pocket trousers in stretch twill with adjustable elastication and a press-stud at the waist, and a fake fly.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a crinkled viscose weave. Short sleeves with smocked trims and smocking at the top and hem. Unlined.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a patterned, crinkled viscose weave with a smocked bodice, long balloon sleeves, a frill trim at the top and cuffs and flounce at the hem.
Pyjamas in soft satin with lace details. V-neck top with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back. Short shorts with an elasticated waist.
Rib-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with high shafts and elasticated tops.
Long-sleeved top in linen jersey with a V-neck and rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
T-shirt in soft slub cotton jersey with a button placket and chest pocket in woven fabric.
Metal watch with an adjustable fastening. Diameter of face 3 cm, width of links 1.5 cm, length of bracelet 23 cm.
Swim top with a print motif and contrasting colour sections at the sides. Stand-up collar and long raglan sleeves. Slightly longer at the back. UPF 50.
